attributes.action: make the Chilcot Inquiry into the Iraq War a Public Inqury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the chilcot inquiry into the iraq war should be made a public inqury since extremely sensitive information, intelligence material in particular, has already been disclosed, either here or in the usa.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
